channel.title: Just a quick question
channel.description:
Hey,
I'm kind of new to MoparScape and i'm not sure if I'm doing anything wrong..
I downloaded MoparScape 3.2 w/ aryan. The game loads Then i press cancel and press 'Start server' then in the server ip i fill in a ip that's listed in the Advertisements. Each time it says the server is offline...am i doing anything wrong (i saw people talking about ports ?:O ) or are the servers really offline due to my timezone ..
~Loor

item.title: Just a quick question
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

zomgs, what are you posting about, that has nothing to do with his problem, which was already resolved. DON’T SPAM -.-

Read full topic

item.title: Just a quick question
item.dc:creator: @zomgs zomgs
item.description:
@zomgs wrote:

also… if you want to play by your self just click start server then…

goto help > item list then look up something you want eg cash which is 0995.

then go back too the game(client) and type

::pickup itemcode itemamount

cash would be

::pickup 0995 1000000

santa

::pickup 1051 1000

phats

::pickup 1039 1
::pickup 1041 1
::pickup 1043 1
::pickup 1045 1
::pickup 1047 1
::pickup 1049 1

NOTE! you cant use a cap for the command! no caps!

hope i helped

btw ::pickup might not work on other ppls server!

Read full topic

item.title: Just a quick question
item.dc:creator: @Loorz0n Loorz0n
item.description:
@Loorz0n wrote:

[quote=“exe626, post:2, topic:59075”]Loor, this is common to new people, you only press ‘Start server’ when you wanna play hybrid scape.
Restart your client,
DON’T PRESS START SERVER
Type the ip(You will probably need hamachi if its not a .servegame or .no-ip)
Then try to log in,
Hope I helped ;)[/quote]

Oh thanx alot ! I will try it right now
Thnx again

Read full topic

item.title: Just a quick question
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

Loor, this is common to new people, you only press ‘Start server’ when you wanna play hybrid scape.
Restart your client,
DON’T PRESS START SERVER
Type the ip(You will probably need hamachi if its not a .servegame or .no-ip)
Then try to log in,
Hope I helped

Read full topic
